message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $80 to both of us. Would you like to purchase it today?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $65. Can you meet me there?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. To provide a fair solution, I would like to offer the product at $70. Is this within your budget?
I'm getting closer, but I was thinking more like $67. Can you meet me halfway?
Considering your feedback, I am willing to negotiate further. How about offering the product at $68? This is my best offer within my pricing strategy.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about $65.50? That's my final offer
Thank you for your offer, Bob. Considering the value of the product and maintaining a fair deal, I am willing to accept $66 for the product. This is my final offer.
I'm really close to buying from John, but I'll give you one last chance. I'll meet you at $65. Can you accept that?
I understand your position, Bob. Given the circumstances, I am willing to accept $65.5 for the product. This is my final offer.
I'm not going to get any closer than this. I'll do $65, that's my final offer
